summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing media monitoring and an interview about Jeffrey Epstein. The participants are coordinating on setting up alerts for news coverage and commenting on an interview they find absurd and unprofessional.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is about monitoring media coverage of him, specifically referencing an interview titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's on His Old Boss'.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein media coverage
events.description: An email chain among individuals discussing media monitoring tools and commenting on an interview about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 14, 2019, discussing media monitoring related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Participants are evaluating tools like Google Alerts and Critical Mention for tracking Epstein-related news.
They reference and criticize an interview titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's on His Old Boss', calling it absurd and unprofessional.
The email shows active coordination among individuals to monitor public coverage of Epstein shortly after his death in August 2019.
